custom_nodes.author: Yuan-ManX
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Hunyuan3D-2.1
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-Hunyuan3D-2.1 is now available in ComfyUI, Hunyuan3D-2.1 is a scalable 3D asset creation system that advances state-of-the-art 3D generation through two pivotal innovations: Fully Open-Source Framework and Physically-Based Rendering (PBR) Texture Synthesis.

custom_nodes.author: Leon
custom_nodes.title: Leon's Utility and API Integration Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive collection of utility and API integration nodes for ComfyUI. Includes image manipulation (4-grid split), string utilities, and multiple API integrations: ImgBB upload, HyprLab upload, Google Image API, Luma AI, FLUX Image API, FLUX Kontext API, and Midjourney proxy integration. Features include image/video hosting, AI image generation, and image description capabilities.

custom_nodes.author: lum3on
custom_nodes.title: comfyui_EdgeTAM
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node implementation of EdgeTAM (On-Device Track Anything Model) for efficient, interactive video object tracking.

custom_nodes.author: christian-byrne
custom_nodes.title: Claude Code ComfyUI Nodes
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for integrating Claude Code SDK - enables AI-powered code generation, analysis, and assistance within ComfyUI workflows

custom_nodes.author: coiichan
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-every-person-seg-coii
custom_nodes.description: A masking tool that provides the ability to break down the detailed contours of characters one by one for multi person use scenarios

custom_nodes.author: havvk
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_AIIA
custom_nodes.description: AIIA Nodes for ComfyUI is a comprehensive suite of advanced nodes designed to streamline and supercharge your video and audio generation workflows. It centrally addresses the critical Out-Of-Memory (OOM) issues encountered when processing long sequences by intelligently handling frames on disk. The suite includes: a powerful Video Combiner with an extensible format system; memory-efficient FLOAT Talking Head Animator nodes with both in-memory (for speed) and on-disk (for stability) modes; and a sophisticated Speaker Diarization toolkit powered by NeMo for identifying who spoke when. Utility nodes like the OOM-safe Image Sequence Concatenator are also included to create comparison or multi-panel videos effortlessly.

custom_nodes.author: dseditor
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Thread
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node package for seamless integration with Threads (Meta's social platform). This package allows you to publish posts, manage images, and retrieve post history directly from your ComfyUI workflows.

custom_nodes.author: flamacore
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI YouTube Uploader
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI node for uploading generated content to YouTube. [a/Buy me a coffee](https://buymeacoffee.com/chao.k)

custom_nodes.author: kiko9
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-KikoTools
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-KikoTools provides carefully crafted, production-ready nodes grouped under the 'ComfyAssets' category. Each tool is designed with clean interfaces, comprehensive testing, and optimized performance for SDXL and FLUX workflows.

custom_nodes.author: TTPlanetPig
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Qwen2.5-VL Object Detection Node
custom_nodes.description: This repository provides a custom ComfyUI node for running object detection with the [a/Qwen 2.5 VL](https://github.com/QwenLM/Qwen2.5-VL) model. The node downloads the selected model on demand, runs a detection prompt and outputs bounding boxes that can be used with segmentation nodes such as [a/SAM2](https://github.com/kijai/ComfyUI-segment-anything-2).

custom_nodes.author: neocrz
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-usetaesd
custom_nodes.description: A custom node set for ComfyUI that provides nodes for encoding and decoding images using Tiny AutoEncoders for Stable Diffusion (TAESD) models.

custom_nodes.author: adamreading
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AjoNodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes designed for ComfyUI from the AJO-reading organization. This repository currently includes the Audio Collect & Concat node, which collects multiple audio segments and concatenates them into a single audio stream.

custom_nodes.author: Zehong-Ma
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MagCache
custom_nodes.description: official implementation of [zehong-ma/MagCache](https://github.com/zehong-ma/MagCache) for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: without-ordinary
custom_nodes.title: OpenOutpaint ComfyUI Interface
custom_nodes.description: An API interface for OpenOutpaint to work with ComfyUI workflow

custom_nodes.author: kiko9
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Selectors
custom_nodes.description: A modern ComfyUI custom node package that provides essential UI controls for image generation workflows. These nodes allow you to centralize commonly shared parameters (scheduler, sampler, dimensions, seeds) and link them to multiple nodes in your workflow, eliminating redundancy while maintaining JSON metadata compatibility.

custom_nodes.author: benjamin-bertram
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI OIDN Denoiser
custom_nodes.description: This custom node for ComfyUI provides a wrapper for Intel's Open Image Denoise (OIDN) library, allowing you to denoise images directly within your ComfyUI workflow.

custom_nodes.author: domenecmiralles
custom_nodes.title: obobo_nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI that provide various input and output capabilities.

custom_nodes.author: Yuan-ManX
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Vui
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-Vui is now available in ComfyUI, Vui is a llama based transformer that predicts audio tokens.

custom_nodes.author: LargeModGames
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI LoRA Auto Downloader
custom_nodes.description: Automatically download missing LoRAs from CivitAI and detect missing LoRAs in workflows. Features smart directory detection and easy installation.

custom_nodes.author: hassan-sd
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Image & Prompt Loader
custom_nodes.description: Load images with automatic prompt extraction from Civitai URLs, caption files, or EXIF metadata. Features smart dataset detection and dynamic preview updates.

custom_nodes.author: Isi-dev
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Animation_Nodes_and_Workflows
custom_nodes.description: These are nodes and workflows that can facilitate the creation of animations and video compilations.

custom_nodes.author: NeoDroleDeGueule
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-image-mixer
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that blends two images in latent space using a mix factor slider.

custom_nodes.author: orion4d
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_extract_imag
custom_nodes.description: This ComfyUI node allows you to extract all images found in various types of documents and save them to disk. It also provides a preview of the first extracted image.

custom_nodes.author: xuhuan2048
custom_nodes.title: ExtractStoryboards
custom_nodes.description: A tool for decomposing video storyboards, which can obtain storyboards and keyframes

custom_nodes.author: sugarkwork
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-trtupscaler
custom_nodes.description: TensorRT Upscaler for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: YMC
custom_nodes.title: ymc_node_joy
custom_nodes.description: comfyui custom nodes to caption image with joy

custom_nodes.author: pawelmal0101
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Webhook Notifier
custom_nodes.description: A simple ComfyUI custom node that sends webhook notifications when images are generated. Perfect for integrating your image generation workflow with external services or your own backend.

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_SOME
custom_nodes.description: Sing to Midi ðŸŽ¶

custom_nodes.author: A043-studios
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Deforum-X-Flux Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Professional video animation nodes for ComfyUI based on Deforum-X-Flux research

custom_nodes.author: AgencyMind
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-GPU-Preprocessor-Wrapper
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node extension that solves multi-GPU device conflicts for ControlNet preprocessors.

custom_nodes.author: orion4d
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI PDF Nodes
custom_nodes.description: This repository contains a set of custom nodes for ComfyUI that allow you to load, manipulate, extract information from, and preview PDF files directly within your workflows.

custom_nodes.author: olivv-cs
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FunPack
custom_nodes.description: A set of custom nodes designed for experiments with video diffusion models.

custom_nodes.author: Zachary116699
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_LoadImageWithMetaDataEx
custom_nodes.description: Custom node for ComfyUI. It can read metadata from the image filepath, and filepath can be provided as a connected input, which allows it to batch read image metadata in a loop.

custom_nodes.author: bytedance
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-lumi-batcher
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Lumi Batcher is a batch processing extension plugin designed for ComfyUI, aiming to improve workflow debugging efficiency. Traditional debugging methods require adjusting parameters one by one, while this tool significantly enhances work efficiency through batch processing capabilities.

custom_nodes.author: fredconex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_SoundFlow
custom_nodes.description: This is a bunch of nodes for ComfyUI to help with sound work.

custom_nodes.author: A043-studios
custom_nodes.title: Pixel3DMM ComfyUI Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Professional 3D face reconstruction for ComfyUI using the Pixel3DMM method

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: Flux Kontext Creator for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A powerful ComfyUI custom node for text-based image editing using Black Forest Labs' Flux Kontext API. Transform your images with simple text instructions while maintaining character consistency and quality.

custom_nodes.author: o-l-l-i
custom_nodes.title: Olm LUT Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: The Olm LUT is a custom node for ComfyUI that allows you to apply .cube LUT (Look-Up Table) files to images within your generative workflows. It supports creative workflows including film emulation, color grading, and aesthetic stylization using LUTs.

custom_nodes.author: Yuan-ManX
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Direct3D-S2
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-Direct3Dâ€‘S2 is now available in ComfyUI, Direct3Dâ€‘S2 - Gigascale 3D Generation Made Easy with Spatial Sparse Attention. Direct3Dâ€‘S2 is a scalable 3D generation framework based on sparse volumes that achieves superior output quality with dramatically reduced training costs.

custom_nodes.author: lum3on
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FrameUtilitys
custom_nodes.description: Professional-grade frame manipulation tools for ComfyUI, providing advanced video editing capabilities with native IMAGE tensor support.

custom_nodes.author: INuBq8
custom_nodes.title: Notification Bridge
custom_nodes.description: Bridge nodes for ComfyUI that send messages through WhatsApp (Twilio) and Discord when a workflow completes.

custom_nodes.author: Erehr
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-EreNodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of prompt managent nodes with advanced tag parsing. Prompt tag cloud, mutiselect, toggle list, randomizer, filter, autocompete.

custom_nodes.author: 11dogzi
custom_nodes.title: CYBERPUNK-STYLE-DIY
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive ComfyUI theme plugin with stunning cyberpunk aesthetics and powerful customization features

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-keitNodes
custom_nodes.description: This is keit's utility nodes.

custom_nodes.author: xiaowc
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-Dynamic-Params
custom_nodes.description: Comfyui custom nodes that support dynamic parameter addition and deletion.

custom_nodes.author: avenstack
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AV-FunASR
custom_nodes.description: FunASR wrapper for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: burnsbert
custom_nodes.title: EBU Workflow
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for general workflow quality of life including resolutions sorted by aspect ratio, upscaling helps, and unique file names

custom_nodes.author: vladpro3
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_BishaNodes
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for ComfyUI to improve promts and image settings

custom_nodes.author: jasonjgardner
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Substance Designer Integration Plugin
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive ComfyUI plugin that enables seamless integration with Substance 3D Designer workflows through command line automation. This plugin provides custom nodes for cooking .sbs files, rendering .sbsar archives, controlling material parameters, and batch processing Substance materials within ComfyUI workflows.

custom_nodes.author: budihartono
custom_nodes.title: CAS Aspect Ratio Presets Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Quickly create empty latents in common resolutions and aspect ratios for SD 1.5, SDXL, Flux, Chroma, and HiDream. Choose from curated presets or generate by axis and aspect ratio. Appears in the 'latent' node group.

custom_nodes.author: spawner
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-aichat
custom_nodes.description: gemini and openai in comfyui

custom_nodes.author: swhsiang
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-3d-gs-renderer
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node to support 3D GS rendering

custom_nodes.author: sLKbabawhsiang
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TuZi-Flux-Kontext
custom_nodes.description: Powerful Flux-Kontext image generation custom node for ComfyUI, using the official RabbitAI API. Supports text-to-image, image-to-image, and multi-image-to-image generation. Supports concurrent generation.

custom_nodes.author: MicheleGuidi
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Computer-Vision
custom_nodes.description: Extension nodes for ComfyUI that improves automatic segmentation using bounding boxes generated by Florence 2 and segmentation from Segment Anything 2 (SAM2). Currently just an enhancement of nodes from [a/Kijai](https://github.com/kijai/ComfyUI-segment-anything-2).

custom_nodes.author: Pigidiy
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LikeSpiderAI-UI
custom_nodes.description: Declarative UI Framework for ComfyUI Nodes. Minimalistic base class for creating UI-based audio/text/image nodes.

custom_nodes.author: hexxacubic
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Prompt_Library
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI Node to save and load prompts from a library.

custom_nodes.author: judian17

custom_nodes.description: Unofficial ComfyUI implementation of [a/UniWorld-V1](https://github.com/PKU-YuanGroup/UniWorld-V1).

custom_nodes.author: whmc76
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-UniversalToolkit
custom_nodes.description: This plugin provides general-purpose utility nodes for ComfyUI. Currently, it implements a 'Blank Cell Generator' node, which can batch-generate images, masks, and latents with specified resolution and color.

custom_nodes.author: xmarre
custom_nodes.title: LoRA-Safe TorchCompile
custom_nodes.description: Drop-in TorchCompile node that preserves LoRA patches.

custom_nodes.author: xiaogui8dangjia

custom_nodes.description: comfyui_imagetostl is a simple node for ComfyUI that converts grayscale images to STL.

custom_nodes.author: NeonLightning

custom_nodes.description: This custom ComfyUI node transforms a core idea into a richly detailed positive prompt using a local [a/Ollama](https://ollama.com) LLM.

custom_nodes.author: laksjdjf
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Imatrix
custom_nodes.description: This is an experimental node for generating an *imatrix* file to reduce quantization errors in GGUF files used with ComfyUI-GGUF.

custom_nodes.author: MDMAchine
custom_nodes.title: MD Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A wild collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI including noise schedulers, samplers, audio preview, latent visualizers, and more â€” built for maximal creative chaos.

custom_nodes.author: spawner
custom_nodes.title: CUI-Lumina2-TeaCache
custom_nodes.description: comfy extension for lumina2 TeaCache

custom_nodes.author: e-tier-newbie

custom_nodes.description: A node for saving cleaned text outputs, useful for LoRA training. Removes unwanted tokens like <pad> and saves to .txt.

custom_nodes.description: A python port of pixelit by giventofly.
